title: Type bed
content:
Just wanted to share a picture I took recently of some old metal type that came with a flatbed press I bought. It has character to say the least!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161640im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Typeblock_4759.jpg)

 [‹ Import AI paths into font softwares to create font file](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161640/http:/typophile.com/node/38245 "Go to previous forum topic") [Adrian Frutiger ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161640/http:/typophile.com/node/38261 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Letterguess

comments.content: Nice picture. Looks like Futura or something similar. :)
